channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report E-2023100091
item.description:
Report E-2023100091

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XWK experienced a UN3266 Flash Clene 1414 release from a 330-gallon poly tote. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct containment and cleanup. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 0.55-gallons of product released to the tote body only due to a puncture. The tote was transferred from the damaged container into a new one. The damaged tote was then cut up and containerized into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

Report E-2023100113

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.
